reviews.review:
As we can already tell from the Half Life franchise, Gordon Freeman is quite the prodigy in a myriad of ways.
After all he is a scientist working in a corporate owned research facility that specialises in many departments, not to mention despite the lack of mention of any weapons experience in his past that he has weapons experience, he manages to wield all of his weapons with incredible finesse and skill ranging from a crowbar, a pistol to a rocket launcher, all the while being able to carry all of them like some kind of pack mule. 
We also observe that he is able to switch through weapons rapidly and store all of them mysteriously, although that can be attributed to the HEV suit having some anomalous, physics breaking features not explained such as a hammerspace where he perhaps stores all of his weapons like immigrants in a clown car. 
I think though the greatest part of this universe is that he has a PHD in some part of science all the while being mute, which I think would be somewhat detrimental to studies due to a lack of communication skills outside of typing and writing which could have possibly carried him in his studies.
A great thing to note is that Gordon Freeman may be an actual sociopath, he seems to show no emotion at all in any games, his colleagues could and have died in terrible ways but he keeps on moving forward like he saw nothing, which could either literally be a lack of empathy and sympathy therefor making him a psycopath, amazing emotion control or an iron will akin to complete desensitization. I can only imagine him busting the fattest one in the world while maintaining a stone cold stoic face.
Apart from his remarkable handling of weapons, you can tell he's a combat expert because he has mastered the art of running away, or tactically retreating if you will as well as taking cover, something the rebels have not conceptualized and even the combine elite struggle to master. This significant combat advantage could lead to a possible scenario where the combine are absolutely crushed because Gordon teaches the art of protecting yourself to rebels who learn how to move during combat and hide behind cover. Hell, Gordon Freeman even seems to be great at parkour as seen by the first section of this game.
Though one thing I do not understand is that he seems to have a crippling lack of stamina which shocks me, as his remarkable reaction time and speed would make it seem like he has some great lungs, but I guess a man cannot have tricks in everything, so while he may have some great strength as seen by his ease of carrying various props & great recoil control with even the most powerful of weapons, as well as some great speed, he may have possibly smoked a pack and destroyed his lungs, therefor being detrimental to his endurance.
Another thing that perplexes me is that why does he use a crowbar of all weapons? I can imagine it being accessible, but there are other options that he could take frankly. A crowbar is great for prying things open, but in terms of weapons, I think it's not too great if the enemy has anything hard protecting their soft baby skulls. I feel like he would do great with a sledgehammer especially with his tremendous strength.
How is this man so talented and so handsome? Even I am not sure, maybe it will be revealed in the future that he was the epitome of perfection in the eyes of god, or maybe he was the product of eugenics. Who knows.
Describe el juego en una palabra: leyenda.

A pesar de sus años, logro envejecer muy bien, convirtiéndose en un clásico, y una joya en la historia de los videojuegos!

ему нельзя дать команду чтобы подождал а то они часто идут на всякие турели и ловушки альянса

Half life ภาคนี้คือดีมาก

《半衰期2》9.2/10

[b]故事简介：[/b]
这个系列简单来说讲述了人类反抗高科技没有达到顶尖的外星人侵略，同时还要窝里斗的故事，（如果科技顶尖的话，人类应该根本没有反抗的机会）故事没有额外的CG，而是实机演示在玩家眼前说话，不给玩家跳过的机会，侧面反应了V社对这故事精彩程度的信心。人物性格与故事走向也确实精彩，并且全程中文配音。

[b]出色引擎：[/b]
得益于V社自研发的物理引擎“起源”，本作许多物体都可以接触互动或者移动，给解谜元素增加了更多的可能性，可以说这是一款结合了专业解谜游戏素质的第一人称射击游戏。对比第一代更加冗长复杂的找路方面的解谜，在本作也得到了精简。不过因年代久远的技术原因导致我遇到了两个bug，只能打开控制台穿墙过了。

[b]物理圣剑：[/b]
在游玩过程中，除了标志性的“物理学圣剑”撬棍之外，玩家还会得到手枪、霰弹枪、冲锋枪、火箭筒、钢箭弓弩、引力枪，射击手感都挺好，杀敌时响起的摇滚乐也让人肾上腺素飙升，可敌人反馈有些单调，大部分情况下只是喷血然后死亡，让我联想到了CSGO，没有一种往后倒的冲击力。（当然，纯竞技游戏不需要什么代入感。）

[b]“光追”水面：[/b]
画面现在看起来一般，可放在当年是顶级的。水面效果没有光追却胜似有光追，如果告诉我这是今年游戏的水面效果，我一点都不意外。极限竞速：地平线4也是没有光追胜似有光追，可半条命2是2004年的游戏啊……V社牛逼。除了表现力之外，画面方面的想象力也是一绝，高耸入云的高科技大楼（故事尾声还会进去逛），外星反派改造的巨型生物机器人，遭科研基地泄漏在地球上肆虐的外星生物......

[code][b]亮点：[/b]
+跨时代的物理引擎与水面反射
+新奇与专业的解谜关卡设计
+世界观的具象化很有想象力
+出色的线性叙事
[b]不足：[/b]
-这么多年了，还是没有3
-偶尔会碰上致命bug，需要开控制台才能过[/code]

[b]总评：[/b]
从本作到L42D系列、DOTA系列、CS系列都可以看出来，V社对自家的游戏都有着极高的要求，这可能也是为什么G胖迟迟不愿意数3的原因。有些故事，即使遗憾，也比狗尾续貂强过百倍，但还是希望V社别真的忘了“数3”。

Отец Грегорий опять ёбнулся и он думает что он Календарь. 
Халва 3 выйдет 3его сентября.
совершенно ебанутая игра для настоящих мужчин
